learningpod.title: Common Core ELA: Vocabulary Acquisition and Use (Context Clues)

p.b: The word project has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the sentence in which project means "to jut or stick outward."

simpleChoice.p: The eaves project from the sides of that house in a dramatic way.
I project that this year Ellie will win the award for best actress.
The city tore down the rundown housing project to make way for a new one.
I have a big project due at the end of the week, so I have no time to relax.
